sentences.en: a carpet with a regular pattern of flowers
sentences.cn: 一块有着规则花卉图案的地毯

sentences.en: a face with regular features
sentences.cn: 五官端正的脸庞

sentences.en: a regular job
sentences.cn: 固定的工作

sentences.en: As a child she had suffered regular bouts of ill health.
sentences.cn: 儿时的她曾饱受病痛的折磨。

sentences.en: As long as the verticals align, the design will look regular.
sentences.cn: 只要所有垂直面在一条线上，图案看起来就会很整齐。

sentences.en: George struggled wildly, going under and resurfacing at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 乔治疯狂地挣扎，不断在水面上浮浮沉沉。

sentences.en: He is being constantly monitored with regular checks on his blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他被实时监测，定时量血压。

sentences.en: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.cn: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.en: He stood in the doorway, listening to her quiet, regular breathing.
sentences.cn: 他站在走道里，听着她那沉静而规律的呼吸声。

sentences.en: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.cn: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.en: Make a point of backing up your files at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 一定要定期备份文件。

sentences.en: Only about a third of the reinforcements will be regular troops.
sentences.cn: 增援部队中仅有约1/3是常备军。

sentences.en: Regular forking of beds and borders relieves the compaction caused by rain.
sentences.cn: 时常翻动一下花圃和草坪四周会让被雨水压紧的土壤松动松动。

sentences.en: She has become a regular visitor to Houghton Hall.
sentences.cn: 她已经成了霍顿府的常客。

sentences.en: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.cn: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.en: The man sat at his regular table near the window.
sentences.cn: 这个人坐在他固定的靠窗的位置。

sentences.en: The molecules in regular liquids are held together by relatively weak bonds.
sentences.cn: 常规液体里分子之间的键合力相对较弱。

sentences.en: The Oxfam shops depend on regular supplies of saleable items.
sentences.cn: 乐施商店靠出售一些人们定期捐赠的适销物品维持经营。

sentences.en: The pipes were placed at regular intervals
sentences.cn: 管道按固定的间距安放。

sentences.en: The product looks and burns like a regular cigarette.
sentences.cn: 这种产品看起来和点燃后都与常见的香烟没什么两样。

sentences.en: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.cn: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.en: Under his editorship, the Economist has introduced regular sports coverage.
sentences.cn: 在他担任编辑期间，《经济家》开始定期刊登体育报道。

sentences.en: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.cn: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.en: You may have regular home visits from a neonatal nurse.
sentences.cn: 可以雇请育婴护士定期到家里提供服务。

words.tran_cn: 定期地；有规律地；整齐地；匀称地
使合法化；使有秩序（等于regularize）
调整；使有秩序；使合法化
常客；正式队员；中坚分子

phrases.tran_cn: 常规性的锻炼；经常操练，按时训练
正则表达式；正规表达式
定期航行；定期服务；正常业务

trans.tran_cn: 有规律的，频繁的，经常做某事的，通常的，普通的，匀称的，固定的，正规的，十足的
trans.tran_en: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

trans.tran_cn: 老主顾，经常参加某活动的人，正规军
trans.tran_en: someone who often goes to the same bar, restaurant etc or who takes part in an activity very often
